overview: Manuel picks up cutie Angel Smalls on his way out of town. She needs to use the washroom, so they stop at his place. When she sees how rich Manuel is, she can't help herself any longer! Family friend James picks up Sydney Cole and decides to bring her home so her parents won't kill him. He tells her to put on some less revealing clothes first, and she uses this as an opportunity to seduce him. Rebel Lynn wants to go to California, so Kurt picks her up because he is going there too. She needs a place to stay, so Kurt invites her to stay with him and it isn't long before they start hooking up. Elsa Jean's friend decides to bail on their plans to go party, so she is to hitchhike. Johnny picks her up, but she feels bad for him because he seems lonely, so she offers to blow him. Obviously it's an offer he can't refuse!
title: Teen Hitchhikers
